The correct chronological order is: (1) She imports the first, shorter clip in Video Star via Edit Video. (2) She taps Add Mask to remove part of the image. (3) She feathers the mask more because the two lightings look different. (4) She presses Create, then Done, and saves the result to the Camera Roll. (5) In TikTok, she uploads the video and selects a matching sound from Favorites. (6) She sets the original audio volume to zero and saves the post as a draft.

Therefore, the answer is A: 1 -> 2 -> 3 -> 4 -> 5 -> 6.

Therefore, the answer is B: 1 -> 2 -> 3 -> 4 -> 5 -> 6.
